CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y curl git build-essential autoconf libtool
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: git clone --branch v1.2.3 https://github.com/grpc/grpc &&     cd grpc &&     git submodule update --init &&     make &&     make install &&     cd .. && rm -rf grpc
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl -o grpc_java_plugin -L 'http://search.maven.org/remotecontent?filepath=io/grpc/protoc-gen-grpc-java/1.2.0/protoc-gen-grpc-java-1.2.0-linux-x86_64.exe' &&     chmod +x grpc_java_plugin &&     mv grpc_java_plugin /usr/local/bin
Commands.Name: run
